alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 5:59AM AKST until December 24 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWFALL FOR PARTS OF SE AK THROUGH CHRISTMAS... The first frontal band is over the far northern panhandle as of 5am. A break between fronts over the central panhandle where very light snow is happening with little accumulation. To the south, the second frontal band is progressing northward across Prince of Wales. This band will reach the Juneau area in the late afternoon, then weaken. A chance of freezing rain remains possible for some of the south-central outflow areas that remain below freezing Saturday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. * WHERE...Yakutat, Skagway, Klondike Highway, and the Haines and surrounding areas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected through early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Yakutat; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
